<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ability Flaws](/Rules.aspx?ID=124)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 33 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
This lists the ability score to which you apply an ability flaw when creating a character of this ancestry. Most ancestries, with the exception of humans, include an ability flaw. For more about applying ability flaws, see [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=76).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
